name: Is this Сooking?
description:
FOR SCRIBBLE JAM

You are on the body of the show "Is this cooking?". You are a chef with "three" lives to complete the 9 levels. The difficulty increases with each level.

You must complete the level in a certain time, otherwise life will be taken away.

Requirements: Play on PC and full screen!!!

Controls:  WASD, Space, Left Mouse Button. 

Not everything was possible due to inexperience. Сomplete this game is possible (if it suddenly seemed difficult). If there are any bugs, write about them.

If WebGL doesn't work, download game for windows '-'

Thanks)
